quotes.quote: This community has fought and continues to fight a war of acceptance, a war of tolerance and the most relentless bravery. You are the definition of courage, do you know that?
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Love is pure and true; love knows no gender.
Everybody has the right to marry the person they love and be represented as a couple and family.
quotes.author: Julianne Moore

quotes.quote: Gender and sexuality are so fluid. It's OK to change your mind a million times and figure out what works for you. It's OK to take your time.
quotes.author: Amandla Stenberg

quotes.quote: I believe that telling our stories, first to ourselves and then to one another and the world, is a revolutionary act.
quotes.author: Janet Mock

quotes.quote: Normal is boring. Be wonderfully weird.
Equality means more than passing laws. The struggle is really won in the hearts and minds of the community, where it really counts.
quotes.author: Barbara Gittings

quotes.quote: Expect people to be who they are and let them go if they aren't ok with you being you.
The only person you need to make proud is yourself.
I'm a young, bisexual woman, and I've spent a large part of my life trying to validate myself—to my friends, to my family, to myself—trying to prove that who I love and how I feel is not a phase.
quotes.author: Halsey

quotes.quote: It's okay, say it: I am fabulous.
What I preach is: People fall in love with people, not gender, not looks, not whatever. What I'm in love with exists on almost a spiritual level.
When you put love out in the world it travels, and it can touch people and reach people in ways that we never even expected.
quotes.author: Laverne Cox

quotes.quote: The single best thing about coming out of the closet is that nobody can insult you by telling you what you've just told them.
Be whoever you want to be and look fabulous doing it!
You deserve people in your life who love you loudly, proudly, and publicly.
It is each American's constitutional right to marry the person they love.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.quote: Being gay is like being left handed. Some people are, most people aren't and nobody really knows why. It's not right or wrong, it's just the way things are.
You change the world by being yourself.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: There will always be enemies. Time to stop being your own.
quotes.author: Larry Kramer

quotes.quote: The problem with gender is that it prescribes how we should be, rather than recognizing who we are.
quotes.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quotes.quote: Love is too beautiful to be hidden in the closet.
I am straight enough to know that if you want to marry whoever you want to marry, you should be able to marry whoever you want to marry.
quotes.author: Patti Labelle

quotes.quote: I believe that no one should ever have to choose between a career we love and living our lives with authenticity and integrity.
quotes.author: Selisse Berry

quotes.quote: The world is so busy telling us who we should be, that we forget who we are.
There will not be a magic day when we wake up and it's now okay to express ourselves publicly. We make that day by doing things publicly until it's simply the way things are.
quotes.author: Tammy Baldwin

quotes.quote: I very much want to inject gay culture into the mainstream. It's not an underground tool for me. It's my whole life.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: What is straight? A line can be straight, or a street, but the human heart, oh, no, it's curved like a road through mountains.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Accepting who you truly are is the deepest form of self-respect.
I don't want other people to decide what I am. I want to decide that for myself.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.quote: We deserve to experience love fully, equally, without shame, and without compromise.
quotes.author: Elliot Page

quotes.quote: The important thing is not the object of love, but the emotion itself.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: Each of us is unique. Respect yourself enough to follow the life path that works best for you, not someone else.
Love is freedom: freedom to laugh, cry, sing, dance, and to simply love and be loved.
We are powerful because we have survived.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Maybe the goal isn't to become something or someone. Maybe the goal is to un-become anything that no longer fits who you want to be.
You can choose to love whoever you love.
quotes.author: Jay Z

quotes.quote: We are who we choose to be.
Our society needs to recognize the unstoppable momentum toward unequivocal civil equality for every gay, lesbian, bisexual, and transgender citizen of this country.
quotes.author: Zachary Quinto

quotes.quote: It always seemed to me a bit pointless to disapprove of homosexuality. It's like disapproving of rain.
Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life; define yourself.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.quote: Be fiercely unapologetic when you are being authentically you.
Everybody's journey is individual. If you fall in love with a boy, you fall in love with a boy.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: It is never too late to decide who you are and become that person.
If you don't like the current trends, consider being the new trendsetter.
There are worst things in life than kissing boys.
quotes.author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz

quotes.quote: You don't have to become who they want. Be yourself. The people meant to be with you prefer you that way.
How other people see me and what they feel about me is their business, not mine.
You don't have to be gay to be a supporter - you just have to be a human.
Now we know that queer and trans people are magic. So many kinds of magic and so many kinds of normal.
quotes.author: Jill Soloway

quotes.quote: Truth is real. Live it. Be it.
There's nothing wrong with you. There's a lot wrong with the world you live in.
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.quote: There's no right or wrong way to be gay. No right or wrong way to come out. It's your journey. Do it the way you wanna do it.
Hell hath no fury like a drag queen scorned.
Love is love. People should be able to do whatever makes them happy.
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.quote: All love is immortal.
